overview: As CEO of GlobalOne, David Northington has ultimate responsibility for GlobalOne’s client satisfaction, growth and market leadership. He has over 25 years experience leading professional services organizations, having served as the COO of Capgemini NA, EVP of Kanbay, COO of Adjoined and CEO of Plaut Consulting. At Capgemini, he oversaw multiple profit and loss centers across the US/Canada and provided strong leadership in many areas including people leadership/management, profit optimization, and vertical expansion.
